FOOTER_LANDING_CARD_DESC: ‚Ä∫ We hope we have convinced you to give our cute Discord bot - Clank - a chance to significantly improve the experience on your Discord server.
SECTION_INTRO_DESC: Clank is the heart of your Discord server: Besides easy use & beautiful menus, it offers you everything you need to protect and grow your own community.
SECTION_INTRO_BANNER_DESC: Clank reaches more than {{user_count}} users on {{guild_count}} servers.
SECTION_FEATURES_TITLE: ‚ùì ~ WHAT MAKES OUR DISCORD BOT SPECIAL?
SECTION_FEATURES_ITEM_1_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Our bot currently offers German & English as possible languages for all bot functions.
SECTION_FEATURES_ITEM_2_DESC: ‚Ä∫ The bot was created by server admins for server admins, which ensures high quality & attention to detail.
SECTION_FEATURES_ITEM_3_DESC: ‚Ä∫ We are constantly working on new major features, based on the wishes of you, to improve the bot!
SECTION_FEATURES_ITEM_4_DESC: ‚Ä∫ We help you set up the bot, fix bugs in a flash & are happy to take care of your concerns.
SECTION_SHOWCASE_ITEM_1_DESC: ‚Ä∫ With our integrated support module (Ticket Modmail tool), users can message the bot via private message, which automatically creates a ticket on your Discord server in a forum channel - this guarantees a user-friendly experience with a clear management system.
SECTION_SHOWCASE_ITEM_1_LIST_5: Fixed support hours for the team
SECTION_SHOWCASE_ITEM_2_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Using the personalized giveaway module, you can create, edit, and manage your own giveaways. Set your own participation conditions, change the design of the giveaway message, and track the activity of your server members.
SECTION_SHOWCASE_ITEM_3_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Our automatic & reliable backup system creates a screenshot of your server 2x per day and saves all channels & roles - if your server is attacked, the corresponding user loses all rights and the changes are reset.
SECTION_SHOWCASE_ITEM_4_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Save important server changes, carried out punishments, server joins and much more in a clear own forum channel, so you can always quickly retrieve the most important events on your Discord server - the log system includes:
SECTION_TUTORIAL_SUBTITLE: HOW DO I SET UP THE DISCORD BOT?
SECTION_TUTORIAL_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Setting up our own cute Discord bot "Clank" might seem a bit complicated at first glance, but it can be done in a flash & is incredibly easy thanks to many user-friendly menus - Yay!
SECTION_TUTORIAL_DESC2: ‚Ä∫ Alternatively, you can also simply use the new dashboard to completely set up the Discord bot.
SECTION_TUTORIAL_CARD_1_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Invite our Discord bot to your Discord server and give him all the rights he asks for during the invitation.
SECTION_TUTORIAL_CARD_2_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Set the language of all texts & messages of the Discord bot by using the command /bot-sprache (or /bot-language).
SECTION_TUTORIAL_CARD_3_DESC: ‚Ä∫ With the slash command /setup you can see all the necessary settings you need to make for special modules (or use the new dashboard).
SECTION_LOGIN_NOTICE_DESC: ‚Ä∫ If you have any questions, contact our
SECTION_WELCOME_DASHBOARD_DESC: With this dashboard, you can make many different settings to our Discord bot "Clank" without having to use the slash commands in Discord itself. This can be done much easier and faster, as it usually only requires a few clicks instead of long messages.
SECTION_WELCOME_DASHBOARD_OUTRO: üöë ‚Ä∫ If you have any questions about specific functions or maybe want to report an error, you can always contact our server team - we usually respond within a few minutes.
SECTION_SERVERLIST_EMPTY_DESC: ‚Ä∫ This cannot be correct - is the API down?
SECTION_BOT_SETUP_TASK_SUPPORT: Support system set up & usable for new tickets
SECTION_BOT_SETUP_TASK_SUPPORT_1: Discord forum channel created & set up
SECTION_BOT_SETUP_TASK_SUPPORT_2: Server team established for better use
SECTION_BOT_SETUP_TASK_SUPPORT_3: Support topics created that users can select for tickets
SECTION_BOT_SETUP_TASK_SUPPORT_4: Set ticket mentions to be informed immediately
SECTION_BOT_SETUP_TASK_SECURITY_1: Log system set up to be informed about important events
SECTION_BOT_SETUP_TASK_SECURITY_2: AutoModeration rules set up for more chat control
SECTION_BOT_SETUP_TASK_SECURITY_3: Set unban method so banned users can apologize
SECTION_BOT_SETUP_TASK_SECURITY_4: Nuke protection active & a backup was created
SECTION_BOT_SETUP_TASK_GLOBAL: Global chat set up to chat server-wide
SECTION_BOT_SETUP_TASK_GLOBAL_1: Channel for global chatting set up
PAGE_CONTACT_DESC_LEFT: ‚úèÔ∏è ‚Ä∫ On this page, we show you some contact options to easily reach our development & support team. This is useful for urgent matters such as legal questions, critical bug reports, or simply to share your ideas for the dashboard or our Clank bot in general.
PAGE_CONTACT_DESC_RIGHT: ‚ö° ‚Ä∫ Our response time is usually very fast and takes a few days - however, we will only respond to your inquiry in most cases if further questions arise in your case, such as with a bug report where we need more information to reproduce the error.
PAGE_CONTACT_ALERT: I have a general question: In this case, you should contact us using a more specific contact form, which you can find on our Blacklist.de ~ Discord server website.
PAGE_WISHLIST_DESC: ‚Ä∫ The features below are major new things that have been requested by our community (you) over time and will soon be integrated into the bot.
PAGE_TEAMLIST_DESC: ‚Ä∫ This feature ensures that certain roles have access to important moderation features & unlocks more ticket tool features.
PAGE_THEMES_DESC: ‚Ä∫ On this page, you can see all the support themes that users can select when creating a ticket on the Discord server.
PAGE_SNIPPETS_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Snippets are premade messages you can use in tickets to respond faster to common questions.
PAGE_SNIPPETS_PREVIEW_DESC: ‚ùì ‚Ä∫ With the help of text snippets, you can quickly respond to frequently asked questions within support tickets by retrieving a predefined text - can be sent using the slash command /ticket snippet use {{name}}.
PAGE_SNIPPETS_PREVIEW_INTRO: ‚ÑπÔ∏è ‚Ä∫ This is how the selected text snippet could be displayed to the user who created the support ticket if a team member uses it in the ticket.
PAGE_BLOCKED_DESC: ‚Ä∫ On this page, you can see all users who are currently unable to create tickets on your Discord server - this can be useful to prevent spam.
PAGE_EVENTS_DESC: ‚Ä∫ On this page, you can see all currently ongoing giveaways that have been created and are still being managed by Clank on your Discord server.
PAGE_EVENTS_DESIGN_DESC: ‚Ä∫ On this page, you can customize the design of embeds that are present in giveaway messages and created by Clank.
PAGE_EVENTS_EFFECTS_DESC: ‚Ä∫ On this page, you can define channel & role effects that influence how users can participate in giveaways or how statistics are counted.
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_SUBTITLE: üåé ~ CHAT SERVER-WIDE WITH OTHER DISCORD USERS
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_DESC: ‚Ä∫ On this page, you can manage the global chat for your Discord server, allowing users on your server to chat with users from other servers.
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_ACTIVE_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Here you can manage the currently set text channel.
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_DESIGN_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Here you can make some visual settings for the profile of the global chat.
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_TOOLTIP_LOCK: üì¢ - This can be useful if users on your server are spamming or arguing.
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_INFO: üëÆ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è ~ Our global chat is monitored by an external moderation team to ensure the safety of all users.
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_NAME_LABEL: ‚úèÔ∏è - What name should the bot use to chat?
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_AVATAR_LABEL: üñºÔ∏è - What avatar should the author have?
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_DESC_LABEL: üìö - Describe your Discord server in one sentence!
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_DESC_PLACEHOLDER: Here you will find custom bots, coding help, and many giveaways.
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_NEWBIE: Hi, I'm new to the global chat!
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_NOT_SET_DESC: ‚Ä∫ As soon as you set a global chat channel on the left, you can make all available settings here.
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_PENDING: ‚è≥ ~ The global chat channel will be set up shortly..
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_PENDING_DESC: ‚Ä∫ This process takes a few minutes - afterwards you can make all settings.
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_DELETION: üìõ ~ Global chat channel will be deleted soon..
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_DELETION_DESC: ‚Ä∫ The global chat channel will be deleted soon - therefore you cannot make any settings here.
PAGE_MISC_GLOBALCHAT_NO_PERMISSIONS_DESC:
‚Ä∫ The bot does not have the required permissions to create the global chat channel!
The bot will automatically try to repeat the process in 10 minutes.
PAGE_SECURITY_REQUESTS_SUBTITLE: üö® ~ USERS, THAT WANT TO GET UNBANNED
PAGE_SECURITY_REQUESTS_DESC: ‚Ä∫ On this page you can see all open unban requests that users have sent to your Discord server.
PAGE_SECURITY_SHIELD_SUBTITLE: üõ°Ô∏è ~ PROTECT YOUR DISCORD SERVER WITH OUR TOOLS
PAGE_SECURITY_SHIELD_DESC: ‚Ä∫ On this page, you can see some Discord tools we offer that protect your Discord server from attacks and thus can increase security.
PAGE_SECURITY_SHIELD_TOOLS_TITLE: üìõ ~ Our security tools for your server
PAGE_SECURITY_SHIELD_TOOLS_DESC: ‚Ä∫ This can help you protect your server's integrity & minimize unwanted activities.
PAGE_SECURITY_SHIELD_ITEM_0_DESC: ‚Ä∫ All new users younger than 7 days are not allowed to join.
PAGE_SECURITY_SHIELD_ITEM_1_DESC: ‚Ä∫ All new users who are likely fake are not allowed to join.
PAGE_SECURITY_SHIELD_ITEM_2_DESC: ‚Ä∫ All new users with exactly the same profile are not allowed to join.
PAGE_SECURITY_SHIELD_ITEM_3_DESC: ‚Ä∫ We monitor server changes & stop suspicious activities.
PAGE_SECURITY_SHIELD_EMPTY_PREMIUM: No backup has been created yet..
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_SUBTITLE: üßÆ ~ ALL SERVER CHANGES AT A GLANCE
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_DESC: ‚Ä∫ On this page you can set up our log system, allowing you to view important events that have occurred on your Discord server at any time.
PAGE_SECURITY_AUTOMOD_DESC: ‚Ä∫ On this page, you can enable automatic moderation for your Discord server and set an unban method for users.
PAGE_SECURITY_AUTOMOD_CONTAINER_DESC: ‚Ä∫ With these Discord AutoMod rules, you can keep your server chats clean and avoid spam.
PAGE_SECURITY_AUTOMOD_CONTAINER_INTRO: üî• - Our automatic Discord moderation rules help you protect your server from spam and unwanted content - we regularly invest a lot of time and effort to make these rules as effective as possible - for a peaceful atmosphere.
PAGE_SECURITY_AUTOMOD_CONTAINER_ITEM_0_D: ‚Ä∫ Our protection for a friendly community covers more than 100+ insults.
PAGE_SECURITY_AUTOMOD_CONTAINER_ITEM_1_D: ‚Ä∫ Our rule set automatically detects spam links and Discord server invites.
PAGE_SECURITY_AUTOMOD_CONTAINER_ITEM_2_D: ‚Ä∫ To avoid spam, we monitor mentions & potential spam messages.
PAGE_SECURITY_AUTOMOD_CONTAINER_ITEM_3_D: ‚Ä∫ We also examine user profiles for common spam links and insults.
PAGE_SECURITY_AUTOMOD_CONTAINER_ITEM_4_D: ‚Ä∫ To prevent anyone from accidentally posting a Discord bot token in the chat, we have created this rule.
PAGE_SECURITY_AUTOMOD_CONTAINER_OUTRO: ‚úç - These rules are designed to detect and remove the most common types of spam and unwanted content, without you having to intervene manually or your moderators having to constantly watch - they are a great addition to your server protection.
PAGE_SECURITY_UNBAN_DESC: ‚Ä∫ This is how users can unban themselves.
PAGE_SECURITY_SHIELD_LOGS_TITLE: üìö ~ Our supported log events for your server
PAGE_SECURITY_SHIELD_LOGS_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Once a log event is enabled, the bot automatically creates the corresponding thread in the log channel.
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_ITEM_GUILD_THREAD_ID_: ‚Ä∫ Includes all changes to server options (server name, vanity URL & more)
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_ITEM_BOT_THREAD_ID_DE: ‚Ä∫ Includes all moderation actions (bans, time-outs & more)
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_ITEM_CHANNEL_ROLES_TH: ‚Ä∫ Includes all changes to channels & roles (creation, deletion & more)
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_ITEM_MESSAGE_THREAD_I: ‚Ä∫ Includes all message actions (deletion, edited & more)
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_ITEM_EMOJI_THREAD_ID_: ‚Ä∫ Includes all emoji & sticker actions (deletion, edited & more)
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_ITEM_UNBAN_THREAD_ID_: ‚Ä∫ Includes unban requests from users who are banned on your server.
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_PICKER_DESC: ‚Ä∫ All events on your Discord server are logged in this channel.
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_CHANNEL_NOT_SET_TITLE: ‚ùå ~ No log channel has been set yet.
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_CHANNEL_PENDING_TITLE: ‚è≥ ~ The log channel will be set up shortly.
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_CHANNEL_DELETION_TITL: üìõ ~ The log channel will be deleted soon.
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_CHANNEL_PERMS_MISSING:
‚Ä∫ The bot does not have the required permissions to create the log forum / manage threads!
The bot will automatically try to repeat the process in 10 minutes.
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_CHANNEL_NOT_SET_DESC: ‚Ä∫ As soon as you set a log channel on the left, you can configure all available log events here.
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_CHANNEL_PENDING_DESC: ‚Ä∫ This process takes a few minutes - afterwards you can configure all log events.
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_CHANNEL_DELETION_DESC: ‚Ä∫ The log channel will be deleted soon - therefore you cannot configure any log events here.
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_ENABLED_TOOLTIP: ‚úÖ ~ This log event will be automatically enabled soon - it is not active yet!
PAGE_SECURITY_LOGS_DISABLED_TOOLTIP: ‚ùå ~ This log event will be deleted soon - it is still active!
PAGE_SETUP_MODULE_DESC_0: Currently, no support tickets can be created on your Discord server.
PAGE_SETUP_MODULE_DESC_1: Support tickets can be created, but there are still recommended settings to make your work easier.
PAGE_SETUP_MODULE_DESC_2: You have made all the recommended settings and the support system can now be used.
PAGE_SETUP_MODULE_DESC_PENDING: The support channel will be set up shortly - this may take a few minutes. Please wait until the process is complete.
PAGE_SETUP_MODULE_DESC_ERROR:
The bot does not have the required permissions to activate the support system - please check the bot permissions!
The bot will automatically try to repeat the process in 10 minutes.
PAGE_SETUP_LEFT_DESC: ‚Ä∫ All tickets created by users on your Discord server will be placed in the support forum - this should only be visible to the server team, as they will handle the support requests here.
PAGE_SETUP_LEFT_LIST:
‚Ä∫ There are 2 ways users can create tickets:
  • They send a private message to the Discord bot.
  • They select a support topic in a panel.
PAGE_SETUP_LEFT_OUTRO: Creating panels and support topics is NOT necessary to activate the system, but it helps the server team to better categorize created tickets.
WISHLIST_EMPTY_TITLE: No features found in this category..
WISHLIST_FEATURE_DESC_1: ‚Ä∫ Users should earn XP and level up by actively participating on the server.
WISHLIST_FEATURE_DESC_2: ‚Ä∫ Users should be able to create temporary voice channels that are automatically deleted.
WISHLIST_FEATURE_DESC_3: ‚Ä∫ Admins should be able to set YouTube/Twitch channels, and the bot will send out live info.
WISHLIST_FEATURE_DESC_4: ‚Ä∫ Servers should be able to set highly personalized welcome messages & join roles.
WISHLIST_FEATURE_DESC_5: ‚Ä∫ Users should be able to play music using the YouTube API or similar.
WISHLIST_FEATURE_DESC_6: ‚Ä∫ Users can mark themselves as "away", making it clearer to other members who is currently available.
WISHLIST_FEATURE_DESC_7: ‚Ä∫ Server members can apply to become a team member of your server & the team can manage these.
EVENTS_TAB_BLACKLIST_DESC: ‚Ä∫ These roles are not allowed to participate in giveaways, regardless of whether they meet the participation requirements.
EVENTS_TAB_BLACKLIST_CHANNEL_DESC: ‚Ä∫ These channels are excluded from statistics, which means, for example, the number of messages is not counted here.
EVENTS_TAB_WHITELIST_DESC: ‚Ä∫ These roles do not have to meet the respective participation requirements to participate in created giveaways.
EVENTS_TAB_BONUS_DESC: ‚Ä∫ These roles receive a x2 bonus on statistics that are counted, such as number of messages, voice chat, etc.
EVENTS_TAB_WIN_DESC: ‚Ä∫ These roles are assigned to server members who participate in giveaways and win them.
EVENTS_TAB_MENTION_DESC: ‚Ä∫ These roles are mentioned directly at the start of a giveaway to draw the respective users' attention.
EVENTS_TAB_MANAGER_DESC: ‚Ä∫ These roles have access to the management of giveaways and can create, edit, and delete them.
EVENTS_TAB_INVITE_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Welcome messages are posted in this channel with information on how the user joined the server.

ERROR_PAGE_404_DESC: ‚Ä∫ The page you requested could not be found - maybe you made a typo?

SUCCESS_GIVEAWAY_EDITED_START_DESC: The giveaway {{name}} will be started automatically in a few minutes!

SUCCESS_SECURITY_UNBAN_DENY_DESC: The unban request from {{user}} ({{user_id}}) was denied - the user remains banned.

SUCCESS_SECURITY_SHIELDS_SAVE_DESC: The changed security measures have been saved successfully!

SUCCESS_MISC_GLOBAL_LOCK_DESC: The global chat was successfully closed - users on your server can no longer send new messages.

SUCCESS_SECURITY_FORUM_DELETE_DESC: The log forum channel {{name}} ({{id}}) will be removed shortly - please wait a few minutes!
SUCCESS_SECURITY_THREADS_SET_DESC: The log threads have been saved successfully - they will be set up automatically shortly!

ERROR_SECURITY_FORUM_DELETE_CONFLICT_DES: The log forum channel {{name}} ({{id}}) is already being removed shortly - please wait a few minutes!

SUCCESS_SECURITY_UNBAN_1_DESC: The unban method was successfully removed!
SUCCESS_SECURITY_AUTOMOD_DESC: The AutoMod rules will be set on the server shortly - please wait a few minutes!
ERROR_SECURITY_AUTOMOD_TITLE: AutoMod rules will be applied soon
ERROR_SECURITY_AUTOMOD_DESC: The AutoMod rules will already be set shortly - please wait a few minutes!
ERROR_SECURITY_UNBAN_METHOD_EMPTY_DESC: Please provide the respective URL/email through which users can request to be unbanned!
ERROR_SECURITY_UNBAN_METHOD_INVALID_INVI: Please provide a valid Discord invite so users can request to be unbanned! (e.g. https://discord.gg/bl4cklist)
ERROR_SECURITY_UNBAN_METHOD_INVALID_URL_: Please provide a valid URL so users can request to be unbanned! (e.g. https://bl4cklist.de/unban)
ERROR_SECURITY_UNBAN_METHOD_INVALID_EMAI: Please enter a valid email address that users can use to request unbanning!
SUCCESS_USER_UNBLOCK_DESC: The user {{user}} ({{user_id}}) can now create tickets on the server again.
SUCCESS_USER_BLOCK_DESC: The user {{user}} ({{user_id}}) can no longer create tickets on the server - The block expires on {{end_date}}.

ERROR_USER_UNBLOCK_NOT_FOUND_DESC: The user {{user}} ({{user_id}}) is not blocked - they can already create tickets.

SUCCESS_ANNOUNCEMENT_DELETE_DESC: The announcement has been removed and will no longer be displayed before ticket creation.
ERROR_ANNOUNCEMENT_NOT_FOUND_DESC: The announcement could not be found - was it already removed?

SUCCESS_MENTION_RESET_DESC: No roles will now be mentioned by default for all tickets.

SIDEBAR_PAGE_HOME_DESC: Shows basic information about the dashboard.

FORM_IDEA_SUGGESTION_1_TITLE: ‚Ä∫ We are always happy to receive new ideas to improve our bots & tools! Every suggestion is important and we thank you! ‚≠ê
FORM_IDEA_SUGGESTION_1_FIELD_1_PLACEHOLD: Give your idea a short title!
FORM_IDEA_SUGGESTION_2_TITLE: ‚Ä∫ In this step, we want to learn more about your idea - describe your suggestion as detailed as possible! ‚ò∫Ô∏è
FORM_IDEA_SUGGESTION_2_FIELD_1_PLACEHOLD: Tell us more - What should it achieve & why do you think it's good?
FORM_IDEA_SUGGESTION_3_TITLE: ‚Ä∫ What category do you think best fits your idea? This helps us better understand where improvements are needed. üìö
FORM_IDEA_SUGGESTION_3_TAG_6: üö® Security system for more server security
FORM_BUG_REPORT_1_TITLE: ‚Ä∫ In this step, we collect general information about your bug so that the development team knows what it is about. ü§î
FORM_BUG_REPORT_1_FIELD_1_PLACEHOLDER: Describe the problem in one sentence - Avoid phrases like "it is broken" or "it glitches".
FORM_BUG_REPORT_2_TITLE: ‚Ä∫ In this step, we try to better understand why this is a bug. üí°
FORM_BUG_REPORT_2_FIELD_1_PLACEHOLDER: The slash command should respond with a dropdown & embed.
FORM_BUG_REPORT_2_FIELD_2_PLACEHOLDER: The slash command fails with the error "Interaction failed".
FORM_BUG_REPORT_3_TITLE: ‚Ä∫ How did you reproduce the bug? This helps us to understand it better. üìù
FORM_BUG_REPORT_3_FIELD_1_PLACEHOLDER: 1. Visit discord.gg/bl4cklist Discord server\n2. Use /help from the Clank bot\n3. The bot's response will fail.
PLACEHOLDER_BUG_REPORT_SUCCESS: Bug has been forwarded - Thank you!
PLACEHOLDER_CONTACT_ERROR: An error occurred - Please try again!
PLACEHOLDER_IDEA_SUGGESTION_SUCCESS: Idea has been forwarded - Thank you!
PLACEHOLDER_PICK_SERVER_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Click on a server in the left sidebar to continue.
PLACEHOLDER_SELECT_TICKET_DESC: Select a ticket from the left column.
PLACEHOLDER_NO_TICKETS_DESC: No tickets have been found on your server yet, wait until one is created!

PLACEHOLDER_REQUESTS_EMPTY: ü•≥ ~ There are no open unban requests!

PLACEHOLDER_THEME_MODAL_ROLES: Which roles should be mentioned for this theme?

PLACEHOLDER_ANNOUNCEMENT_MODAL_INFO: ‚ùì ‚Ä∫ This announcement will always be shown to users before they create a new ticket - this allows users to receive important information without contacting the team.
PLACEHOLDER_BLOCKED_USER_MODAL_DESC: What is the ID of the discord user?
